util.math

Class FFTRadix2

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.math.FFT

  • public class FFTRadix2
extends FFT
    Fast Fourier Transform
    From: https://www.ee.columbia.edu/~ronw/code/MEAPsoft/doc/html/FFT_8java-source.html
    Optimized further by EPICI
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Columbia University (see license)

        Get shared FFT object for known power of 2

        Returns:
        an FFT object which can process arrays of length 1<<m
